reviewText: This DVD arrived in the mail in a timely manner, works perfectly, and my summer school students loved watching!
Our family loves everything about Signing Time! It has helped my son to very quickly acquire language. Strongly recommend as a learning tool to all children/students.
My son and daughter both love signing time videos and have developed a large sign vocabulary.  This one has been great to teach my daughter stories she ordinarily won't sit still long enough to hear.
